hero.title: Your adventure starts where music calls you.
hero.subtitle: Every festival is a gateway to a new culture. GrooveNomad takes you on a musical and human adventure, designed just for you.

features.title: How does it work?
features.subtitle: A simple and efficient process for an unforgettable travel experience.

cards.title: A 100% tailor-made trip
cards.desc: Your wishes, your style, your budget. GrooveNomad offers you a fully personalized adventure, from the festival vibe to your lodging and local experiences.

cards.title: A new way to plan your trip
cards.desc: No more endless searching. Chat with our bot, it gets to know you and builds your ideal stay in just a few minutes.

cards.title: Carefully selected festivals
cards.desc: We only offer you the best. Festivals renowned for their atmosphere, their line-up, and their accessibility, all over Europe (and soon beyond).

cards.title: Fast response and instant quote
cards.desc: No need to wait for an agent. Once you‚Äôve shared your wishes, you get a complete proposal (journeys, lodging, options) that‚Äôs clear and editable.

cards.title: Seamless support up to departure
cards.desc: Your trip is in good hands. Your personal space lets you track your booking, ask questions, and adjust your stay until the last moment.

gallery.title: GrooveNomad experiences
gallery.description: Discover unique festivals around the world ‚Äî each destination is a cultural, musical, and human immersion.

festivals.title: ü™© Tomorrowland ‚Äì Belgium
festivals.desc: One of the world's biggest electronic festivals, famous for its spectacular stages, magical vibe, and legendary line-up in a small Belgian town.

festivals.title: üåá S√≥nar ‚Äì Barcelona, Spain
festivals.desc: A festival of electronic music, digital art, and technological innovation in the heart of Barcelona. A must for fans of futuristic culture.

festivals.title: üå¥ Coachella ‚Äì California, USA
festivals.desc: One of the most talked-about festivals in the world. Fashion, pop culture, and legendary line-ups in the California desert, under the sun at the Empire Polo Club.

festivals.title: üî• Burning Man ‚Äì Black Rock Desert, USA
festivals.desc: More than a festival, it‚Äôs a laboratory of artistic creation and human experimentation in the Nevada desert. Radicality, freedom, and bonfires guaranteed.

festivals.title: üåç Afrikaburn ‚Äì South Africa
festivals.desc: The African version of Burning Man, Afrikaburn invites you to total artistic immersion in the Tankwa Karoo desert. Radical creativity and collective spirit.

festivals.title: üåÑ Meadows in the Mountains ‚Äì Bulgaria
festivals.desc: A festival perched in the Bulgarian mountains, where nature, alternative music, and a sense of community come together at sunrise.

list.name: Jonathan Yombo

list.name: Yucel Faruksahan

list.name: Oketa Fred

list.name: Zeki

list.name: Joseph Kitheka
list.quote: I tried it for a festival in Portugal and it was perfect. I met lots of people there and everything was planned in advance, stress-free.

list.name: Khatab Wedaa
list.quote: I usually like to plan everything myself, but here I let go. And honestly, it was better than if I‚Äôd done it myself.

list.name: Rodrigo Aguilar

list.name: Eric Ampire

list.name: Roland Tubonge
